WaveSoundBuffer

The WaveSoundBuffer class manages PCM playback.
The WaveSoundBuffer class can load and process .sli files created with the Loop Tuner. For details, please refer to the Loop Tuner documentation.

Members

Constructor
WaveSoundBuffer
Methods
fade ( Start fade )
freeDirectSound ( Release DirectSound )

open ( Open media )
play ( Play media )
stop ( Stop media )
stopFade ( Stop fade )
